thread.title: Insider Spyder™ Announces The Launch of Insider Spyder 1.0™ And Significant Company Growth.
thread.title_full: Insider Spyder™ Announces The Launch of Insider Spyder 1.0™ And Significant Company Growth.

author: Brooke Greenwald
title: Insider Spyder™ Announces The Launch of Insider Spyder 1.0™ And Significant Company Growth.
text:
Insider Spyder™ is pleased to announce that it has launched and installed Insider Spyder 1.0™ at multiple client sites. The company is also pleased to announce double-digit growth since the past quarter. “Insider Spyder™, through our current technology plan and our 1.0 release, has created a measurement and management security solution, that turns the industry from a reactive one into a proactive one. Now, with Insider Spyder 1.0™, companies can see where their concerns lie before a breach happens. We are helping organizations maintain a more secure posture, so they have the knowledge they need to prevent a breach and keep their network secure,” said Scott Gorvett, Founder, Insider Spyder.
Insider Spyder™ Inc. is a privately-funded cyber security software organization offering the enterprise a cost-effective insider threat detection platform with MITRE Technology Applied. Insider Spyder’s platform utilizes predictive behavioral analytics to learn employee patterns on a continuous basis, thus giving organizations trusted user insight from the boardroom to the mailroom. This is a “must have” for companies that want to mitigate threats and manage privacy.
“Not only are we excited about Insider Spider’s 1.0 launch, but we are even more excited that we have, as a result of this launch, seen double-digit growth over the past quarter. This demonstrates the crucial need for companies to become more proactive at a time when breaches are happening almost daily,” said Scott Gorvet, Founder, Insider Spyder™.
The Insider Spyder 1.0™ solution enables companies to customize their detection engines and rate the risks associated with them in real time. Understanding what is happening in your network is critical when looking to prevent insider (and outsider) attacks.
About Insider Spyder, Inc. ™
Insider Spyder™, Inc. sells cyber security software to stop insider threats and manage risk. Continuous monitoring and User Behavioral Analytics proactively detect suspicious insider activity and hackers acting as legitimate users. Using advanced statistics, Insider Spyder™ analyzes user actions that lead to breaches, while maintaining a very low false-positive rate. It is the most effective and efficient solution to protect sensitive data from insider threats. Insider Spyder™ is headquartered in Chantilly, Virginia. For more information please visit us at: http://www.insiderspyder.com .
